about_the_game:
In this new item pack, you’ll discover relics of the past to decorate your base with. These ancient trinkets come from the lost inhabitants of the isles, a last echo of their presence here. All items are usable both on land and in the Ark ship’s haul!

Improve the style of your shelter with 5 new items:

  • 2 statues of forgotten gods. Eternal life would be lonely without some otherworldly company.
  • A large lamp to repel the darkness of the night or animate a sinister dungeon
  • A smoking pipe to add some cachet to your domicile. Explorer yet gentleman.
  • A dream catcher to avoid the sleepless nights, unless you’re out looking for rocks.
